mapper.insert:
replace into stock_base(ts_code, stock_name, stock_code, area, industry, full_name, en_name, cn_spell, market, status, is_hs) values
#{stockBase.tsCode),#{stockBase.stockName},#{stockBase.stockCode},#{stockBase.area},#{stockBase.industry},#{stockBase.fullName}, #{stockBase.enName},#{stockBase.cnSpell},#{stockBase.market},#{stockBase.status},#{stockBase.isHs}
